name: Turf Club Cocktail
description: The drink was suggested to me by Eric Alperin from The Varnish in Los Angeles--it has a suave potency of flavor and rightly demonstrates gin's appealing qualities. Not that a good gin needs any help in the lovability department.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well for around 20 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a small piece of lemon peel over the drink and drop the twist in as garnish.
